title: Hand-raised vegetable pie
ingredients: ['For the pastry', '200g (7 oz) plain flour', '55g (2 oz) strong bread flour', '55g (2 oz) butter', '150ml (1/4 pint) hot water', '75g (2 1/2 oz) vegetable suet', '1 teaspoon salt', 'For the filling', '2 carrots, diced', '1/2 swede or 1 turnip, diced', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, chopped', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 egg, for brushing', 'For the jelly', '150ml (1/4 pint) hot water', '1 vegetable stock cube', '1 sachet vegetable gelatine']
